headings.usage: Use for all section titles, hero text, and card headers. Tight tracking (-0.02em).
headings.anti_pattern: Do not use Inter for headings.

body.usage: Use for all paragraphs, inputs, and data tables.
body.note: Ensure 'Manrope' is actually used in index.css (currently it points to Inter).

mono.usage: Use for code snippets, API keys, and data metrics.

primary.name: Electric Blue
primary.usage: Primary CTAs, active states, key highlights.

surface_strategies.name: The Tracing Beam
surface_strategies.css_class: group relative overflow-hidden border border-white/10 bg-slate-900/50 backdrop-blur-xl

spacing.rule: Containers with borders must have internal padding (p-6+) to prevent text collision.

buttons.style: Sharp or slightly rounded (rounded-lg). No full pills.

cards.style: Flat background, 1px subtle border, no shadow by default. Hover adds shadow.

inputs.style: bg-slate-50 dark:bg-slate-900 border-slate-200 dark:border-slate-800 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500/20

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. REFACTOR index.css: Replace the 'Violet/Purple' theme with the 'Electric Blue/Obsidian' theme defined in colors.
2. UPDATE tailwind.config.js: Ensure 'Manrope' is the default sans font, replacing Inter.
3. IMPLEMENT Dark Mode toggle: Ensure the app supports class-based dark mode.
4. APPLY Bento Grid: Refactor the Dashboard layout to use the Bento Grid strategy.
5. ENHANCE Cards: Add the 'Tracing Beam' or 'Hover Glow' effect to job cards.
6. ADD Motion: Wrap page contents in a motion component for smooth entry.
7. USE Images: Replace placeholders with the provided Unsplash URLs.
universal_guidelines: Do not use generic centered layouts.
Create depth through layered design elements.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
All interactive elements MUST include data-testid.
